Philippines  

The 23rd National Conference and Exhibition of Employers (NCEE XXIII) on May 30-31, 2002 served as the Global Compact Launch in the Philippines. With the theme "Global Compact Initiative: Reaching Out and Making It Work", NCEE XXIII made front-page news when President Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, in her keynote address, endorsed the program as being in consonance with the social reform agenda of her administration. Over 700 participants from various sectors attended the conference, and about 150 signatories to the Global Compact were generated.
